articles.author: Justin Joyce
articles.description:
If you want to acquire a treasure trove of role-playing games while helping others play too, you're in luck. Available on Itch.io right now is the TTRPGs for Accessible Gaming Charity bundle, featuring just over 300 tabletop role-playing games from 139 different game designers. 


Organized by ChariTTRPGs creator Jes Wade, the bundle is a fundraising effort for the DOTS RPG Project. The mission of DOTS is to make gaming at the table more accessible for those who are blind and visually impaired. "While digital dice rollers may be an option," the bundle page reads, "they lack the tactile experience and immersion of physically rolling dice." Hoping to bring that tactile experience to those who need it, DOTS has been testing their own dice, the Signature Braille RPG Dice.


image via DOTS RPG Project


To create the Braille RPG Dice, DOTS has been working with well-known dice maker Die Hard Dice to test and prototype their sets. Work on the dice has been ongoing since 2018, but now the dice are ready to be mass produced and shipped to retail locations. That is where the bundle enters the picture. 


The goal of the bundle is to raise $20,000, the initial funds needed for production of the dice after which, according to Wade, the production model would become self-sustaining. To achieve this goal, many incredible indie TTRPGs have been brought together, including Runecairn Wardensaga, Eldritch Care Unit, Atomic-Powered Mutant Grrls, Teenagers With Attitude, and many more. 


For more information on the details of how each die in the Signature Braille RPG Dice set is made, you can check out their announcement post on Rascal. If you're interested in supporting the DOTS RPG Project, more information on how you can is available on the bundle sale page. The TTRPGs for Accessible Gaming Charity bundle runs until October 20.

The post This TTRPG charity bundle is raising funds for braille dice appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: This TTRPG charity bundle is raising funds for braille dice

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Originally released a little over a year ago, Blasphemous II is a great example of how to do a sequel right. Now we're about to get more of said sequel with the news that the Mea Culpa DLC is due out on October 31, 2024.


There's more on the way beyond the paid DLC. The Game Kitchen is also cooking up a free update, "True Torment," for release at the same time. Here's a very quick tease for Mea Culpa. The DLC will be priced at $11.99 when it drops on Halloween and discounted at 20 percent off for the first two weeks. 




The DLC's title refers to the lost sword The Penitent One wielded in the first Blasphemous, which launched five years ago this month. The sequel's new expansion adds in two new areas — each with new bosses — four new quests, and a new alternate ending.


There's a lot going on in the free update, too. True Torment introduces New Game Plus, as well as more enemies, abilities, prayers, and updated quality-of-life and accessibility features. One of the new challenges is the Labyrinth of Tides, the name of which is suitably mysterious and foreboding now but comes dangerously close to sounding like the Blasphemous equivalent of a water temple. 


It's been long enough since Blasphemous II came out that dealing with these new challenges might just necessitate a fresh start. You'll soon find me trudging through Cvstodia once again with hell in my eyes.

The post Blasphemous II commits further sins on Halloween in Mea Culpa DLC appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Blasphemous II commits further sins on Halloween in Mea Culpa DLC

articles.description:
With the release of Update 0.5 for Anime Vanguards, titled the Slayer's Corp update, a brand-new secret called Renguku was added. Rengoku and his evolved form, Renguku (Purgatory) are extremely powerful and worthwhile to farm for. Here is how to get Rengoku in Anime Vanguards with Update 0.5.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to get Renguku


The new Rengoku Secret Unit in Anime Vanguards can only be obtained by completing the first Raid, more specifically Spider Forest Act 4. In order to unlock the new Raids in Anime Vanguards you must first complete every Act from the Story Mode across all three maps.


With Raids unlocked, you'll need to be Acts 1-3 of the Spider Forest Raid in order to unlock Act 4. Each time you complete the Spider Forest Act 4 Raid map you will have a 1% chance of acquiring the new Renguko Secret Unit.


However, with the Slayer's Corp update, there's a way to increase your chances of getting Renguko even further. As you complete the Raids you will get a new type of currency called Red Web. You can turn in 400 of these Red Webs at the Raid Shop vendor for a Fortune Catalyst (Slayer) item, that increases the drop chance of all Secret units, including Renguko. If you're impatient, you can also purchase this item for $199 Robux.


How to evolve into Renguku (Purgatory)


Even though Renguko is powerful on his own, his evolved Purgatory form is even stronger. In his Renguku (Purgatory) Evolved form, the unit gains a secondary ability called Unwavering Focus. This ability increases damage by 5% for each consecutive attack on the same enemy, stacking up to four times, for a maximum of 20%.


You can evolve Renguku into Renguku (Purgatory) by acquiring the following materials and visiting the Evolve NPC:



1x Slayer's Cape (Purchased for 600 Red Webs at the Raid Shop)


40x Green Essence Stone


14x Yellow Essence Stone


14x Red Essence Stone


13x Pink Essence Stone


4x Rainbow Essence Stone


15,000 Gold


The post How to get Renguko in Anime Vanguards appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Renguko in Anime Vanguards

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
The first season of My Happy Marriage was an instant hit when it was released on Netflix back in July 2023, quickly working its way into the hearts of viewers. It’s an incredibly touching story, and the anime is coming back for a second season in January 2025. 




There’s something special about watching someone realize their worth when they’ve been downtrodden their entire life, thanks to mistreatment from others. It’s something that I can heavily relate to myself, and I know a lot of others can likely say the same. My Happy Marriage takes this concept up a notch. 


Season one of My Happy Marriage saw Miyo, a girl who thought that she wasn’t worthy of love, betrothed to the somewhat grumpy and hard-shelled Kiyoka, whose previous fiancées had fled within three days of meeting him. Over the course of the season, we saw her determination slowly win over his heart and, eventually, love blossomed. 


Of course, there were plenty of trials and tribulations faced by the couple, but there will likely be more to come in the second season. Miyo, with her Dream-Sight ability, will come face to face with Kiyoka’s mother for the first time, something which apparently doesn’t go smoothly judging from the teaser released by Netflix. 


Here's a teaser from the press release: "In the second season, the battle over the 'blood of the Usuba' that flows through Miyo enters a new phase, with their love put to the test. Will these two be able to fully protect the happiness they have finally grasped in their hands?"


I have complete faith in the pair's love and dedication to each other, and I fully believe that together they can get through anything, but it’s sure to be a bumpy ride. Episodes will be released weekly, so there’s going to be some nail-biting time between installments as we wait to see what happens. 

The post My Happy Marriage season 2 is coming to Netflix in January 2025 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: My Happy Marriage season 2 is coming to Netflix in January 2025

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
Waiting around for your Daily Quests to reset can be a very boring endeavor, especially when you don't know exactly when it will happen. If you're unaware, Dailies do reset at a specific time, and knowing when will make the process less tedious to deal with.


How often do Dailies reset in WoW: The War Within?


Timezones can make the Daily reset time difficult to match up, but every WoW server has a universal 'Server Time' to make it easier to comprehend. This 'Server Time' usually matches up with your local time. 


With that in mind, Daily Resets occur at 8:00 PM PDT for NA servers and 9:00 PM PDT for EU servers. If you've been running Bountiful Delves or have daily craft limits on professions, then the above times are when these activities reset back to their base level and can be completed again. Additionally, one of the four zones in The War Within will have golden orbs spawn in the air daily. These will also reset at the above times, but change to a different zone each time.


When do Weeklies reset in WoW: The War Within?


Similar to Dailies, Weeklies reset at 8:00 PM PDT for NA, and 9:00 PM PDT for EU, every Tuesday. Weeklies include major zone-wide events such as Awaken the Machine and the Lamplighter quest hub (Spreading the Light). 


Additionally, all main versions of the current raid, Nerub-ar Palace, reset at the above-mentioned times. Note that LFR, Normal, Heroic, and Mythic versions of the raid will reset at these times, but all four difficulties have separate lock-outs and can be run weekly. The only version of the raid that will not reset (because there is no lock-out) is the Story Mode version. This is because there is no loot to be earned in Story Mode, and thus, can be run as often as you like.

The post When do Dailies reset in WoW: The War Within? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: When do Dailies reset in WoW: The War Within?

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
In Destiny 2, there are a lot of weapons you can grind for. Some of these are worth more than others, but it's always nice to get the god roll for your weapon of choice.


With so many weapons and sources, however, it can be tough to know where to get your favorite tools of the trade. Here's how to get the Midnight Coup hand cannon in Destiny 2.


Where to find the Midnight Coup hand cannon in Destiny 2


Screenshot by Destructoid


The easiest way to get the Midnight Coup hand cannon in Destiny 2 is to farm Onslaught playlist activities. These can be found within the Vanguard menu, where you'd normally select the standard strike playlists or Nightfalls. Either playlist works, but the one that has you do 10 waves instead of 50 waves will be much faster. Completing these 10 waves rewards a …
articles.title: How to get the Midnight Coup hand cannon in Destiny 2

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Every step in Fruit Battlegrounds almost always requires a bit of grinding, whether through the player rank or the fruits themselves. Although it'll be tedious, there are a few ways to make it go by much quicker. 


We're here to explain each technique by showing you how to level up fast in Fruit Battlegrounds.


Fruit Battlegrounds leveling up fast guide


You can level up fast in Fruits Battlegrounds through the following methods:



Spam fruit abilities


Defeat bosses


Win tournaments


Use 2X EXP pass 



Out of all the techniques, spamming abilities prove to be the most tried and true one. Unleash any Devil Fruit attacks, and you'll see a level boost immediately after. Even if you're just punching the air, it'll still count toward it as a form of practice. Settle down somewhere with…
articles.title: How to level up fast in Fruit Battlegrounds

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
With the release of Anime Vanguards, tower defense fans have the chance to defend their base with a variety of Dragon Ball Z-themed units. Like most Roblox tower defense games, there are tons of units but not much of an indication as to which ones are worth getting.  We've put together this Anime Vanguards Tier List to show you which units you should try and get right away.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Anime Vanguards Tier List for all Units


Update: With the launch of Update 0.5, Slayer's Corp, six brand new units including three new evolutions have been added to Anime Vanguards. As such we have updated the tier list to reflect all units including those with the new Slayer's Corp update. Most of the existing units have not been updated in any way, so their respective spots on the tier l…
articles.title: Anime Vanguards Tier List for Update 0.5

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Sony revealed on the PlayStation Blog that the next PlayStation State of Play is set for tomorrow, September 24, at 6 pm EST. The presentation will be streamed on both YouTube and Twitch and will feature more than 20 upcoming PS5 and PS VR 2 titles from studios all over the world.


The last State of Play occurred in May of this year and focused primarily on the ill-fated Concord, taking up over 10 minutes of the roughly half-hour presentation. As for what to expect with this State of Play, Sony hasn't confirmed anything specific but has mentioned over 20 titles will be front and center. It's highly likely we'll see Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered officially announced, and there have been rumors of other PlayStation title remasters in the works.


Surely any remastered announcements will attempt to show off the newly announced PlayStation 5 Pro, and I imagine we'll see a 'Enhanced for PS5 Pro' or similar moniker after most of the reveals. You know, marketing stuff.


However, it's always possible that Sony has kept a top-secret new IP or popular IP game announcement that hasn't leaked yet. It feels like as good a time of ever for Sony to have an ace up their sleeve, after all.


But if the State of Play is bound to be packed full of remasters, wake me up when Bloodborne Remastered drops.


The upcoming PlayStation State of Play starts at 6 pm EST tomorrow, September 24, and will be live on both YouTube and Twitch.

The post State of Play set for September 24, featuring over 20 upcoming titles appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: State of Play set for September 24, featuring over 20 upcoming titles

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
Slay the Goo Save the World is a time-limited World Quest in The War Within that is troublesome to complete, thanks to the unwieldy requirements to do so. If you're struggling to finish this demanding quest, here's exactly how to do each part.


How to finish Slay the Goo Save the World in The War Within


Slay the Goo Save the World has four requirements you must meet to complete it. Before that though, you can start this quest by heading to The Maddening Deep while the World Quest is active on your map. You can find it in the deepest zone of Khaz Algar, Azj-Kahet (/way 65, 82).


To meet the first requirement, you need to obtain a minimum of 50 stacks of Unseeming Shift, which is a debuff you can stack up while in The Maddening Deep. This is easily done by standing in the Black Blood liq…
articles.title: How to start and complete Slay the Goo Save the World in WoW The War Within

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Diamonds are one of the rarest and most resources in Stardew Valley, and they can be quite hard to find. If you want to build a stockpile of Diamonds, or start using the resource, you've got several options. 


There are a few different ways to get Diamonds in Stardew Valley, but most of them are far from guaranteed. Whether you want to get a do-over with Grandpa’s Evaluation, or a gift that’s sure to score Friendship points, here’s how to get Diamonds and how to use them. 


From mining to festivals, here's where to find Diamonds in Stardew Valley


Screenshot by Destructoid


Diamonds may be hard to find, but there are plenty of opportunities that may give you some. Some of these are far more guaranteed than others, and others will only be available in the later stages of a playthrough. …
articles.title: How to get Diamonds in Stardew Valley

articles.author: Franklin Bellone Borges
articles.description:
Among the mid-tier resources players can encounter in LEGO Fortnite, very few are more vital than Obsidian. The material is a requirement for building must-haves like the Metal Smelter, Epic Pickaxe, Oven, and a few other handy items. 


But as the material can only be found in very specific locations, getting your hands on it can prove to be a challenge. To help you with that, here's how to get Obsidian in LEGO Fortnite. 


Where to find and how to get Obsidian in LEGO Fortnite


You can get Obsidian in LEGO Fortnite by mainly mining it from Lava Caves, which can be spotted exclusively across the Dry Lands biome. Once inside any of the caves, you will be able to easily spot the obsidian rocks by their deep purple color and mine them by using a Rare or above Pickaxe. If you have yet to get the item, the Rare Pickaxe can be crafted by expending three Flexwood Rods and three Sand Claws. 


Image by Destructoid


Make sure to keep in mind that the lava caves are extremely hot environments that will slowly drain your health even while carrying multiple Cool-Headed Charms. To minimize that and get an extra layer of protection, I highly recommend that you also bring a few Snowberries and Snowberry Shakes for the expedition. You can check out how to make both the heat-resisting charm and the shake below:



Cool-Headed Charm (Uncommon): By expending 3x Silk Thread, 1x Marble, and 3x Sand Shells.


Snowberry Shake: By expending 2x Snowberry and 1x Milk. Can only be made with a Juicer. You can find Snowberries in bushes all around the Frostlands and get Milk by petting cows.  



Now that you know how to get Obsidian, don't forget to also check out how to craft a Musket, a Flintlock Pistol, and a Cannon in LEGO Fortnite.

The post How to get Obsidian in LEGO Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Obsidian in LEGO Fortnite

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Nintendo has released an interview with The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom staff Eiji Aonuma, Tomomi Sano, Satoshi Terada that gives some behind-the-scenes background to the development of the game. Among the tidbits of information is the fact that the game once took a very different form.


Specifically, Echoes of Wisdom began with a “Game with dungeon creation in mind,” according to Aonuma. However, from there, it quickly changed to an “edit dungeon” format. In this concept, Link could change the perspective or move objects to “edit” the dungeon and solve puzzles. A lot of this still made it into the final version in the form of the eponymous echoes that Zelda can create. 


However, from the sound of things, Grezzo was aiming for something closer to the “Zelda Maker” concept, but it was dropped for the “edit dungeon” format, which was then scaled back to the game it is now. In particular, this quote from Sano really sums up the evolution:



“Of course, creating dungeons was fun, but being able to copy various objects and use them in different places was even more fun.”
Tomomi Sano



I could get behind a Zelda dungeon maker. In fact, it would probably be good for me; expanding the way I think about the series’ design in the same way that Mario Maker did. I think it’s possible that Nintendo will do it one day, even if the current attempt at this mutated into Echoes of Wisdom. There is certainly enough demand for the concept.


The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom is out on September 26, 2024 for Switch. You can read the full interview over here on Nintendo’s site.

The post Echoes of Wisdom was first prototyped as a Zelda dungeon maker appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Echoes of Wisdom was first prototyped as a Zelda dungeon maker

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
A few days ago, Sony let God of War Ragnarök run free on Steam, nearly two years after its debut on PlayStation 5. However, there's been a bit of contention regarding the publisher's insistence that players need a PSN account, even if they don't have the console version. Or even the console itself.


Still, trust the modding community to come to the rescue. As spotted by DSO Gaming, Nexus Mods user iArtorias released an unofficial tool for the game that allows PC users to boot up Ragnarök without having to sign up for a PlayStation Network account.




The modder says the download is a "tiny library that fully strips the PlayStation PC SDK runtime requirement," after some players encountered problems with the port of the game. They do make it clear that the mod is not intended to encourage…
articles.title: God of War Ragnarök mod removes Sony’s PlayStation Network requirement

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
On October 1, 2024, Netflix, Paramount Pictures, Sony Pictures, Universal Studios, Walt Disney Studios, and Warner Bros. Discovery, will welcome Amazon to the most exclusive club in Hollywood; the Motion Picture Association. Prime Video & Amazon MGM Studios, which encompasses Amazon's streaming platform and its film and TV production and distribution division, will become the seventh MPA member and the most recent addition since Netflix joined in 2019.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Amazon Joins the MPA as its Newest Anti-Piracy Member Since Netflix in 2019

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Telegram, an essential communication tool for millions, finds itself under scrutiny once again. Copyright holders have long expressed concerns about the lack of enforcement on the platform, and recent actions suggest Telegram is responding. Subscribers to Z-Library's popular channel recently noticed that several of the shadow library's messages have been removed "due to copyright infringement."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Telegram Removes Z-Library Posts ‘Due to Copyright Infringement’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Recent developments in the ongoing battle against pirate IPTV service MagisTV reveal an unprecedented move by an Argentine court. In addition to blocking 69 domains associated with the service, the court has ordered Google to "immediately uninstall" Magis TV apps from Android devices. This measure targets apps that users have sideloaded, as MagisTV is not available on the official Google Play store.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Google to “Uninstall” Pirate IPTV App Sideloaded on Android Devices

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Blink Twice' tops the chart, followed by 'The Crow'. 'Inside Out 2' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/23/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Former piracy giant RARBG closed its doors last year but as is often the case, the brand lives on through knockoff sites. Surprisingly, however, the original RARBG.to domain is back online as well, taking the shape of a shady Thai casino affiliate. This will undoubtedly cause confusion; search engine DuckDuckGo, for example, still identifies RARBG.to as the "official" site.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: RARBG Domain Now Points to a Thai Casino Site

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In November 2023, the publisher of smash-hit videogame Genshin Impact obtained a DMCA subpoena hoping to identify who was behind the leak of unreleased artwork on Elon Musk's X platform. X Corp. challenged the subpoena, citing the user's anonymous speech rights under the First Amendment. In an order published this week, a district court judge denied X Corps' motion to quash, in theory exposing the alleged leaker's identity to Cognosphere.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: X Loses Battle to Protect Genshin Impact Leaker’s First Amendment Anonymity

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Brazil's Ministry of Justice and Public Security today announced fresh action and the latest achievements in the ongoing 'Operation 404' anti-piracy campaign. International partners including City of London Police, MPA, ACE, IFPI, ESA, ALIANZA, and the EU's Intellectual Property Office, assisted local agencies as they reportedly took down 675 pirate sites, 14 apps, and executed search and seizure warrants. Data seen  by TF reveals that ISP's in Brazil now block 6,700+ domains.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation 404.7 Targets 675 Pirate Sites, Brazil’s ISPs Now Block 6,700+ Domains

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Last month, anti-piracy forces celebrated the takedown of Fmovies, the world's largest piracy ring. Motion Picture Association CEO Charles Rivkin boasted that they "took down the mothership". While the victory stands today, not all loose ends were tied up. The domain of Fmovies' hosting platform Vidsrc.to is back online, presumably resurrected by another piracy ring. The Empire Strikes Back? 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Video Hosting Domain of Fmovies ‘Mothership’ Makes Surprise Comeback

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
There have been many durable pirate sites over the years with The Pirate Bay   perhaps the most high-profile of them all. While it has fewer years under its belt, pirate IPTV service Magis TV is under attack from all sides. The latest broadside in Argentina will see the country's ISPs block around 70 domains, but that's just the tip of the iceberg. The Alliance for Creativity and Entertainment has seized a similar number yet Magis TV has somehow managed to stay afloat.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Magis TV IPTV Crackdown Blocks 70 Domains, Hundreds Already Wiped Out

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
As part of a voluntary agreement with copyright holders, German ISPs block a list of structurally infringing websites. This blocklist has recently expanded with the sports streaming site TotalSportek. The responsible “Clearing Body” concluded that, since efforts to shut down the site or identify its owners failed, site blocking is a reasonable and proportionate measure.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Germany Adds Sports Streaming Site ‘TotalSportek’ to Pirate Site Blocklist

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Several Internet Providers, including Verizon, have asked the U.S. Supreme Court to grant Cox Communications' appeal in a landmark piracy liability case. The ISPs stress that the current ruling creates "extortionate pressure" that puts innocent subscribers at risk. A separate brief from Boston College Law School Professor Alfred Yen, also urges the Supreme Court to take on the case. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISPs Back Cox’s Supreme Court Petition to Counter “Extortionate” Piracy Liability Pressure

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Premier League fans searching for an illegal stream of the Spurs v Arsenal match on Sunday may have received an unexpected intervention. As part of the BeStreamWise anti-piracy campaign, would-be pirates on X and Reddit were reportedly gifted a link to a stream, but not of the match. The replacement featured a real stream made entirely of water, protecting the viewer from malware and potentially curing them of piracy forever. For those who missed out, there are other things to try.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fake Streams ‘Save’ Premier League Pirates, Security Tips Can Save More

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this year, a Hawaiian district court blocked movie companies' efforts to unmask alleged BitTorrent pirates using a DMCA subpoena 'shortcut'. The filmmakers requested the court to reconsider its position, but without success. Undeterred, the filmmakers are now petitioning the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit to review the lower court's findings.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Movie Companies Take DMCA Subpoena ‘Shortcut’ Dispute to Court of Appeals

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
British musician Eddy Grant has prevailed in his copyright infringement lawsuit against Donald Trump and his 2020 campaign team over their infringing use of the iconic track 'Electric Avenue'. After consuming four years of Grant's life, the case turned on a fair use defense; under scrutiny of the court, it effortlessly failed to convince on any of the four factors that combine to indicate a permitted, non-infringing use of a copyright work.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Eddy Grant Wins: Trump’s ‘Fair Use’ of ‘Electric Avenue’ Was Anything But

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In recent years Brazil's telecoms agency has claimed significant success in its mission to prevent pirate set-top boxes from accessing premium content. Whether Anatel  is feeling a little vulnerable, or would simply like some new blocking ideas, is up for debate. However, in roughly ten days' time, hackers will descend on São Paulo for a two-day hackathon. Cash prizes await those who manage to disable pirate IPTV devices to the extent they can no longer communicate with their owners.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Hackers Invited to Pirate IPTV Blocking Hackathon to Silence Illegal Devices

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Initially reported as technical issues, in September 2023 file-hosting platform Uptobox watched as its servers went offline. In reality, they were being taken away due to a criminal complaint filed by Hollywood, Canal+, Apple, Amazon, and other rightsholders. Since then, the owners of Uptobox have turned to the legal system, hoping to salvage whatever they can. On Thursday, a Paris court informed the defendants that their servers will not be returned.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Seized Uptobox Servers Won’t Be Returned, Requests Ruled Inadmissible

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A court in Paris, France, has ordered major Internet providers to block 98 domain names used by popular book download portal Z-Library.  The order comes in response to a complaint from the National Publishers Union (SNE), but the victory may be bittersweet. Many of the listed domain names were previously seized by U.S. authorities, and expanding the current order could prove time-consuming.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Pirate Site Blocking Order Targets Expired and Seized Z-Library Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Serie A CEO Luigi De Siervo's dramatic take on Italian football's piracy problems isn't new, likewise his insistence that only coercive action will produce results. "Football is being killed," he said in a recent interview. "However, at the end of this battle we will win. Because it's either them or us." How this will be achieved isn't clear. Pirates keep jumping to new servers and if promises are kept, fans are getting sued next.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Parasitic’ IPTV Piracy is Killing Football, “It’s Them or Us” Says Serie A CEO

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Anti-piracy coalition ACE reports that Egyptian law enforcement authorities have shut down Laroza, the 'largest' pirate site in the Middle East and North Africa. Two of the alleged operators were arrested. The piracy ring operated dozens of domains and generated millions of pageviews per month. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Helps Egypt to Dismantle the Region’s Largest Piracy Site

articles.description:
Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 8 is now available in the Canary channel.
If you already have an Android Studio build on the Canary channel,
you can get the update by clicking Help > Check for Updates (or Android Studio > Check
for Updates on macOS). Otherwise, you can download it here.
For information on new features and changes in Android Studio Ladybug, see the Android Studio Preview release notes.

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug, see
closed issues.
Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.
General fixes and features
Below is a list of general fixes in Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 8 and Android Gradle Plugin 8.7.0-alpha08. These are a result of your bug
reports, which help us to make Android Studio better. If you encounter a problem, let us know by reporting a bug. You can also vote for an existing issue to indicate that it also affects
you.

  
    
Fixed Issues
    
Android Gradle Plugin
      
        

          
            

              
Issue #344016691
AGP should claim that it supports API 35 that is about to ship

            

              
Issue #230685896
Running Android lint failed with NoSuchFileException
articles.title: Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 8 now available

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film má docela originální námět, ze kterého by mohlo vzniknout něco opravdu unikátního, kdyby měl lepší scénář, lepšího režiséra a lepší herce. Takhle je to 10 zajímavých minut na začátku, pak hodina nudy a pak 30 minut WTF, ve kterých už není možné nijak soucítit s nikým na plátně a bylo mi srdečně jedno, co se vlastně "doopravdy" stalo. (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nikdy se nepouštěj! [Never Let Go] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: 110 minut docela kvalitního retra, které připomíná spíše "Po strništi bos" než cokoliv od Bohdana Slámy, a pak 20 minut něčeho zcela jiného, co je buď vrcholně originální nebo vrcholně nevydařené, ale v každém případě to pramálo navazuje na 110 předchozích minut. Znovu se ukazuje, že Sláma bravurně zvládá drobné situace, ale má problémy s dvouhodinovým, někam směřujícím dějem. Krobot je jako obvykle úžasný. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Konec světa - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Skoro dokonalý horor. Nepředvídatelný, ale přesto celkem logický děj. Hutná atmosféra, tvořená novými permutacemi starých klišé, bez nutnosti uchylovat se k lekačkám a stříkající krvi. Nepotřebuji to vidět znovu, ale dlouho jsem něco tak kvalitního neviděl a nevšiml jsem si mnoha věcí, které by se daly zlepšit. (Ilča 80 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Duše prokletých [Oddity] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Velmi příjemné překvapení. Dobře napsané i zahrané scény mezi lidmi, kterým poněkud nefunguje komunikace a navzájem si připadají "trochu divní". Fungovalo by to dobře jako normální (nehororové) současné drama. Ke konci se to trochu zvrhne do standardní vyvražďovačky, ale pořád výrazný nadprůměr s několika výbornými scenáristickými nápady. Neviděl jsem dánský originál. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nepřivolávej nic zlého [Speak no Evil] (2024) - 80 %

articles.title: A co budete vy hrát 21. října?

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Čtyři lidoopové chodí přírodou, hýkají, a stane se jim pět nebo šest věcí, které stojí za zmínku. Potenciálně dojemná patnáctiminutová hříčka, která byla zcela nesmyslně natažena na 90 minut, následkem čehož se její rozvleklost téměř nedá fyzicky vydržet. (Ilča 5 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Chlupatá rodinka [Sasquatch Sunset] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Po svěžích "Chudáčcích" je tohle návrat k intelektuální artovosti "Humra" nebo "Posvátného jelena". Výborní herci, výborná atmosféra jednotlivých scén, ale velmi brzy jsem se přestal snažit chápat, co si z toho mám vlastně odnést. Mírným pozitivem je, že to jsou tři oddělené minipříběhy (se stejnými herci) a ne jeden dlouhý. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Milé laskavosti [Kinds of Kindness] - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Surrealistický artfilm, který by byl možná originální před 70 lety a zajímavě retro před 30 lety, ale dnes je především nudný a nemá k ničemu co říct. Je chvályhodné, pokud tento film pomůže zlepšit podmínky v dětských domovech, ale bez hromady doprovodných informací není ani zřejmé, že má mít nějaký takový účel. Z toho, co se děje na plátně, nevyplývá nic víc než "Podívejte, co se honí v mé šílené hlavě, zajímá vás to?" Mě osobně ne. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Amerikánka - 30 %
